backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user profiles, access control, balance updates, and profile-related queries with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to the new extended format while preserving all other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for all major frontend files and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH dark theme variables and base element resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, pt-BR language, font loading, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Core React app wiring authentication, profile setup, theming, routing, and global query client.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that collects and saves user profile info with role‑specific fields when no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Gatekeeper that checks Internet Identity status and renders login UI or children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Component that blocks access for non-admins and shows an access denied alert.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppMark: Renders the app logo and name using localized strings.
Displays footer with attribution, current year, and a referral link.
Layout wrapper providing main content area and a persistent bottom tab bar.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar that switches routes and highlights the active tab.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login flow, stored identity restoration, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, tickets, favorites, and announcements.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.pt-BR.ts: Portuguese string dictionary containing all UI labels and messages.
frontend/src/i18n/useStrings.ts: Exports a hook and helper to access localized string values.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines CSS variables, base styles, and typography for light/dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/IngressosPage.tsx: Displays user tickets, ticket statuses, and admin validation access with conditional rendering.
frontend/src/pages/InicioPage.tsx: Shows home page with quick-access cards and announcements with priority indicators.
frontend/src/pages/MapaPage.tsx: Renders event map legend, a placeholder map, and points of interest categories.
frontend/src/pages/PerfilPage.tsx: Shows user profile, balance, roles, and admin tools with logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramacaoPage.tsx: Provides event schedule tabs, favorites management, and sections for tattoo, moto, and lineup content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, and feature list for building a dark‑mode mobile event app with pt‑BR UI and role‑based navigation.
